I'm starting high, at $1,000,000. This is a good starting point as it allows room for negotiation and shows that I value the product highly. It's also important to note that I am aware of the "floor" price for the product ($800,000) and I am not willing to go below that. I'm hoping Bob sees the value in the product and is willing to pay a premium, but I am prepared to negotiate.
